title: Society Homepage About Public Health Policy Contact
author: Amosy E M'Koma; William A Breaux; Maya A Bragg
description: The Medical Research Archives is an international scientific peer-reviewed journal publishing articles in all disciplines of medicine, with a focus on new research. Each quarterly issue includes new research findings, reviews, editorial articles, and recent clinical developments.
